categories: Category:Jedi Consulars of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Demas Reyalmid was a male Human Jedi of the Galactic Republic living during the Galactic War with the reconstituted Sith Empire. Following the Battle of Rishi, he was part of Satele Shan's force that traveled to Yavin 4 and established the anti-Revanite Yavin Coalition along with Imperial forces under Sith Lord Darth Marr.

Demas Reyalmid appears as a Jedi Consular gear vendor in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014. He was later removed during a gear system restructuring.
